data.title: Casa Lleo Morera
data.meta_description: Casa Lleo Morera is a famous Modernista house located in the Eixample district of Barcelona. The interior comprised of mosaics, ceramics and wood.
data.text:
Although most of the building is closed to the public, visitors can tour a portion of it.

For more information, please visit www.casalleomorera.com.
